title: [Large-scale] Online Flipped Learning-Based Language Education Competency Enhancement Program for In-Service Elementary Teachers: Focus on Text, Expression, and Reading Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital educational tools, foundational elementary language education theory (grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension), and SNS-based learning experience
context.additional_context: A program designed to enhance practicing elementary teachers' language education expertise in the post-COVID-19 educational landscape. It emphasizes blended learning preparedness and teacher-led participatory instructional design. Key focuses include digital text analysis, creative expression activities, and collaborative reading comprehension strategy development.

learning_goals: Learners design five or more integrated online language lesson modules (listening/speaking/reading/writing) applying the flipped learning model.
Learners can apply grammar and vocabulary-based lesson materials developed through peer assessment and feedback with over 80% suitability in practical settings.
Learners can develop and implement at least three learner-centered activities (writing feedback, text analysis, expressive activities) using digital collaboration tools.

resources: OER (Open Educational Resources) for Language Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
